song_lyric:
it's no fun to go out at night 
so we decided to stay at home 
drink beer, watch TV 

we are singing now 
but we don't know what we're singing for 
singing for the money? singing for ourself? 

hey you wanna go to night club 
wanna sing a song in the KTV 
dancing in the 88 drinking in the 99 

oh my darling i don't know where i can take you to
